title: Fun day out!!
text: Really enjoyed the day - the hire was easy, seamless and the guys there were so helpful. Would highly recommend and would use again. Really good way to see the new forest.

title: Disorganised and weird atmosphere
text: We went here as a group dinner after a conference, seating was not great - all squashed up and no room to move. It clearly was not suitable for a party of 8 or more. There was no atmosphere and starters were brought out the same time as mains so it was all abit cramped on the table and didn’t have a relaxed chatty atmosphere as you felt rushed.

title: Looks beautiful but website needs updating
text: We tried to see the Acropolis on the last day of a work conference as we finished early but when we arrived it was closed. Their website had said 8-8pm but when we got there at 6 it was closed - hugely disappointing! We couldn’t walk round as it was gated all around and everywhere was pitch black.

title: Beautiful views
text:
Came here as part of work conference. The view of the Acropolis from the hotel restaurant was beautiful but my room was a big disappointment. Not only did I face some air conditioning unit but the only day when I could have a lie in, I was rudely awaken at 8am by the sound of pneumatic drilling which vibrated the back of my wall - not what you needed as a wake up call after a late night!!
The room had no thermostat and I was constantly cold or if I put on the fan I couldn’t sleep due to the noise. Food was buffet style - probably due to the fact we were such a large group but it got a bit boring after having it for lunch and dinner.

title: Amazing sushi
text: Had the most amazing sushi here and the chef is so sweet, takes pride in his food. He is always looking to see if we enjoyed the food and has a beaming smile when he sees enjoy the food. Sushi will never taste the same!

title: Nice evening - Raza was fantastic
text: Had a lovely meal with family - food was great and it was a pleasant surprise to have Raza as our table entertainer. Raza was amazing with his magic tricks and such an enjoyable evening out- would recommend to friends and family. Ask should keep Raza as a permanent fixture!

title: Modrophenia
text: Went there on a hens weekend and it was great fun! The puzzles were difficult but entertaining and Pam was a great host! Would definitely recommend as a group or hens activity. Good times were had by all. :)

title: Amazing fun !!
text: We booked as a group of four for a birthday celebration and did the Wild West escape room. The puzzles were well thought out and flowed really well. David our games master was amazing - funny, helpful and really made us feel immersed in the world. David always kept us informed all the way of the times etc and was always on hand if ever we needed anything. Thoroughly enjoyed the event and will definetly be coming back to do another one.

title: Amazing hote
text: Beautiful hote in a perfect location right in the heart of Disney Springs. The hotel was clean and the staff were helpful and friendly. The breakfast with Disney characters were a lovely touch! Would recommend and come back again.

title: Location was great and great staff
text: Stayed here for one night before we travelled to France. The room was very clean and the staff were so friendly and helpful. A lovely hotel and we would stay here again if ever we had an early start. Very convenient and loved being able to park the car there as we met up with friends and took only one car. Car was safe and we were impressed with the amount of parking spaces. We couldn’t give it 5* as there was limited choice at breakfast but still really good for a hotel being a stone throw away.
place: Holiday Inn Express Folkestone Channel Tunnel
